    • Method Detail

      • getAllTool

        public static List<Material> getAllTool()
                                 throws CustomException
        Get all tools. This method calls the database with a prepared statement to request an arraylist of all elements from the tools table.
        Returns:
        An arraylist of all tools objects.
        Throws:
        CustomException - if SQl syntax contains errors, can't connect to database, the connection class isn't found or the closeStatement() method can't close the connection.

      • getTool

        public static Material getTool(int tool_id)
                        throws CustomException
        Get tool by id. This method calls the database with a prepared statement to request an element from the tools table by it's 'tool_id'.
        Parameters:
        tool_id - The id attached to the tool. Should not be out of index bounds.
        Returns:
        A Material object with requested id.
        Throws:
        CustomException - if SQl syntax contains errors, can't connect to database, the connection class isn't found or the closeStatement() method can't close the connection.

      • updateTool

        public static Material updateTool(Material material)
                           throws CustomException
        Update tool with Material object. This method calls the database with a prepared statement to request an update on a specific tool. By using an material object as parameter, this method will use multiple get methods to modify the attributes for the giving id.
        Parameters:
        material - The modified material object. Should not be null.
        Returns:
        An updated material object.
        Throws:
        CustomException - if SQl syntax contains errors, can't connect to database, the connection class isn't found or the closeStatement() method can't close the connection.
